name: eco_skincare_launch_campaign
description: Build comprehensive campaign for eco-friendly skincare launch
user_message: Build a full campaign to launch our new eco-friendly skincare product targeting environmentally conscious millennials (25-40), primarily female. Budget is $50k, 3 months timeline. Use Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and influencer partnerships.

name: b2b_saas_lead_generation
description: Build B2B SaaS lead generation campaign
user_message: Create a campaign to increase B2B SaaS product sign-ups targeting small business owners and marketing managers. Budget $30k, 2 months. Use LinkedIn, email, webinars, and content marketing.

name: happy_path_new_service_launch
description: Tests a standard scenario for launching a new service with clear objectives and resources.
user_message: We need a campaign plan to launch our new online course platform for aspiring digital artists. Our goal is to achieve 500 sign-ups in the first 3 months. Our target audience is young adults (18-30) interested in creative arts. We have a budget of $40,000 and want to use Instagram, Facebook, and Pinterest. Our brand is vibrant, encouraging, and community-focused.

name: minimal_input_clarification_needed
description: Tests the agent's ability to identify missing critical information and prompt the user for clarification.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign. Objective: increase brand awareness. What should I do?

name: zero_budget_organic_strategy
description: Tests the agent's ability to formulate a campaign plan with a $0 budget, focusing on organic and earned media strategies.
user_message: Create a campaign plan to promote our local community garden event. Objective: get 100 attendees. Target audience: local families and residents. Budget: $0. Timeline: 1 month. Channels: Local community groups, Facebook groups, flyers, local news outreach. Brand: accessible, community-driven.

name: extremely_short_timeline_rapid_deployment
description: Tests the agent's ability to create a highly focused and rapid deployment plan for a very short timeline.
user_message: We need a campaign to drive last-minute registrations for an online summit happening next week (7 days). Objective: 200 new registrations. Target audience: tech professionals. Budget: $5,000. Channels: LinkedIn, targeted email blast. Brand: urgent, exclusive.

name: conflicting_budget_and_reach_expectations
description: Tests how the agent handles a scenario where the budget is likely insufficient for the stated objective and channels.
user_message: Launch a global brand awareness campaign for our new luxury watch line. Objective: reach 100 million people worldwide. Target audience: high-net-worth individuals. Budget: $10,000. Timeline: 6 months. Channels: Instagram, YouTube, luxury lifestyle blogs. Brand: exclusive, sophisticated.

name: niche_b2b_complex_product
description: Tests the agent's ability to tailor a campaign for a highly specific B2B audience and a complex product.
user_message: Develop a lead generation campaign for our AI-powered data analytics platform. Objective: 50 qualified enterprise leads. Target audience: CIOs and Head of Data Science in Fortune 500 companies. Budget: $75,000. Timeline: 4 months. Channels: LinkedIn, industry conferences (virtual), whitepapers, direct outreach. Brand: innovative, authoritative, secure.

name: no_channels_suggest_best_fit
description: Tests the agent's ability to recommend appropriate channels when none are specified, based on objectives and audience.
user_message: We need to promote our new indie video game. Objective: build hype and pre-orders. Target audience: hardcore gamers (16-35). Budget: $25,000. Timeline: 2 months before launch. Brand: edgy, nostalgic, community-driven.

name: multiple_objectives_prioritization
description: Tests how the agent balances and prioritizes multiple campaign objectives.
user_message: Create a campaign plan for our established coffee shop chain. Objective: increase foot traffic by 15% AND promote our new loyalty program. Target audience: local residents, daily commuters. Budget: $15,000. Timeline: 2 months. Channels: Instagram, local newspaper ads, in-store promotions, local radio. Brand: cozy, community-focused, quality-driven.

name: unusual_channels_evaluation
description: Tests the agent's ability to evaluate and potentially incorporate or reject unusual/non-standard marketing channels.
user_message: Plan a campaign for a new avant-garde art gallery opening. Objective: generate buzz and get 500 visitors in the first month. Target audience: art enthusiasts, cultural explorers. Budget: $18,000. Timeline: 6 weeks. Channels: local art blogs, street art installations, guerrilla marketing, Instagram, local event listings. Brand: experimental, thought-provoking.

name: brand_guidelines_emphasis_luxury
description: Tests the agent's adherence to specific brand guidelines, particularly for a luxury brand requiring sophisticated messaging.
user_message: We're launching a limited-edition luxury watch. Objective: drive exclusive pre-orders. Target audience: ultra-high-net-worth individuals, collectors. Budget: $100,000. Timeline: 2 months. Channels: High-end lifestyle magazines (print/digital), invitation-only events, exclusive email lists, private client advisors. Brand: heritage, craftsmanship, exclusivity, understated elegance.
